description: This file defines Express routes for authentication endpoints including register, login, and logout, importing corresponding controller functions and authentication middleware.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Registers a new user by calling postRegister.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Logs in a user via postLogin.

methods.name: router.post('/logout')
methods.description: Logs out a user, requiring authentication, via postLogout.
